product_name: REI Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets - Package of 10
long_description: An essential item for summertime first aid kits, the REI Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets help replace the essential chemicals the body loses to dehydration and heat exhaustion. Use to reduce fatigue, muscle cramps, and heat exhaustion due to excessive perspiration. Includes 10 packets with 2 tablets each. Active ingredients per tablet include 22mg of sodium chloride, 15mg of potassium chloride, 18mg of calcium carbonate.
short_description: An essential item for summertime first aid kits, the REI Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets help replace the essential chemicals the body loses to dehydration and heat exhaustion.
